stdint.h

00001 /*$Id: stdint.h,v 1.1 2006/07/03 14:18:24 dah Exp $*/
00002 
00003 /* Partly accomodates lack of stdint.h on different plattforms. */
00004 
00005 #ifndef APPROXSIM_STDINT_H
00006 #define APPROXSIM_STDINT_H
00007 
00008 // Platform Dependent
00009 #ifdef __sun__
00010 #include <inttypes.h>
00011 #elif __win__
00012 
00013 #ifdef _LONGLONG
00014 typedef _LONGLONG int64_t;
00015 typedef _ULONGLONG uint64_t;
00016 #else
00017 typedef __int64 int64_t;
00018 typedef unsigned __int64 uint64_t;
00019 #endif
00020 typedef __int32 int32_t;
00021 typedef __int16 int16_t;
00022 typedef __int8 int8_t;
00023 
00024 typedef unsigned __int8 uint8_t;
00025 #else
00026 #include <stdint.h>
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #endif 
00030 /* APPROXSIM_STDINT_H */
